entry.title: You can built stuff.
entry.content: Rust has a mature HTTP stack{% include level.html level=2%} and various frameworks{% include level.html level=3 %} enable you to build APIs and backend services quickly. While increasingly more databases drivers{% include level.html level=2 %} become available, ORMs{% include level.html level=5 %} and connections to external services{% include level.html level=5 %} (like search or worker queues) are still scarce. Looking farther, it doesn't necessarily get better. Though there is significant support for base needs (like data compression{% include level.html level=2 %} or logging{% include level.html level=2 %}), a lot more web-specific needs are still unmet and immature.
